about-me.title: About me
about-me.text: I am passionate about creating digital experiences. With knowledge in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I am committed to learning and growing in the field of front-end development. My current goal is to be part of a dynamic environment where I can apply my skills to develop intuitive and engaging user interfaces, collaborate with professionals, and learn from experienced mentors.

experience.title: Experience
experience.text: GOIRI JEWELRY E-COMMERCE: Using React.js, I have created this user interface for the Goiri Jewelry e-commerce site. This interface allows users to view the products they are purchasing, as well as the quantity of each product. The interface also includes a shopping cart that displays the value of each product and the total purchase amount. HAMBURGER MENU E-COMMERCE: Using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I have created this user interface for the Smashed Babys e-commerce site. This interface allows users to view the products available for purchase and includes a built-in shopping cart that lets users modify the quantity of purchased products and displays the total purchase amount.
